channel.title: Project Destiny 474 - Great Economy, Great Skilling! ~ Highscores! ~
channel.description:
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v201/YDoUCare/pdsignaturecopy-1.png[/img] Welcome to Project Destiny
Forums: http://rune-shiver.com/forum/member.php?action=register&referrer=15 Web client and downloadable client on the forums.
Credits to Scu11 for the base I used, google. Credits to Huey & Killamess for the many things his release will help me with. Credits to Luke132 & Nando for Duel arena. Credits to `Wizard Jesse & Men/Thing1 for music.
Features:
High Scores Webclient Mostly all NPCs in the free world Everything completely clipped. (NPCs, Players, Following) All magic spells working perfectly with correct projectiles Perfect switching, PvP, PvM, and MvM Most shops in the free world. Still adding more XP Rate is 10x Real economy: Skills actually mean something! Money isn't too easy, but it's not too hard either All prayers working with head icons Tanning hides and crafting leather working for regular and green leather Gem cutting Perfect woodcutting, mining, and smithing Perfect clan chat 100% Uptime, we're never down! Many sounds added, all spells, blocking and attacking for all weapons Regional music system, many regions have been added. Fishing and cooking work flawlessly, however some spots need to be added Runecrafting with talismans dropped by NPCs. Full duel arena, with all options and staking. Full firemaking, with clipped directions. Full fletching.
Quests
Rune Mysteries Lost City Priest in Peril
HIGHSCORES!!
[img]http://i.imgur.com/tPGxq.png[/img] [img]http://i297.photobucket.com/albums/mm229/slysteeler/pd1.png[/img] [img]http://i297.photobucket.com/albums/mm229/slysteeler/pd2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i297.photobucket.com/albums/mm229/slysteeler/pd3.jpg[/img] [img]http://i297.photobucket.com/albums/mm229/slysteeler/pd4.png[/img] [img]http://i297.photobucket.com/albums/mm229/slysteeler/pd5.jpg[/img] [img]http://i297.photobucket.com/albums/mm229/slysteeler/pd6.jpg[/img][img]http://i297.photobucket.com/albums/mm229/slysteeler/pd7.png[/img] [img]http://i297.photobucket.com/albums/mm229/slysteeler/pd8.jpg[/img] [img]http://i297.photobucket.com/albums/mm229/slysteeler/pd9.jpg[/img]

item.dc:creator: @112233sk8 112233sk8
item.description:
@112233sk8 wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

that’s the base. Which is based off Hyperion.

It is possible to convert Hyperion to 474 it’s not hard.

item.title: Project Destiny 474 - Great Economy, Great Skilling! ~ Highscores! ~
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“112233sk8, post:56, topic:451858”]To clear up what everyone is talking about… This server is based on google 474.
google 474 was based on Hyperion.
It is not Project Insanity.

Shiver added basically everything you’ll see in the server when you log in and play for a while. The base came with a couple of skills and a
pretty good combat system.[/quote]
Thank you, it all makes sense now. We knew it wasn’t PI seeing the game-play, but Hyperion isn’t a 474, nor has anyone adjusted it to be that way.

Read full topic

Shiver added basically everything you’ll see in the server when you log in and play for a while. The base came with a couple of skills and a
pretty good combat system.

@Shiver wrote:

Listen, you all clearly have no clue what you are talking about.

Leave my thread, and @ the above poster, you’re autistic if you think I (the only developer for this server) am an idiot.

You my friend have no clue what you’re talking about. Add me on Skype: Shiver474
I’d love to completely shit on you sometime. Until then, get off my thread.

Also, IT’S HYPERION…

It’s neither.
[/quote]If a hyperion engine was added then the packets DO need to be redone. For further information talk with superman[/quote]
Last time I checked there wasn’t a 474 Hyperion… Possibly I’m wrong, but it seems the developers of this server are idiots, so I don’t know. They might not know.

item.title: Project Destiny 474 - Great Economy, Great Skilling! ~ Highscores! ~
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:40, topic:451858”][quote author=shiverr link=topic=554749.msg4082606#msg4082606 date=1345497575]

The content that is added is flawless.

Meaning this server runs just like RuneScape? Using the RuneScape Clock?
I doubt it. There is no such thing as “flawless”, everyone has their own programming habits.

Actually…that post is quite ignorant…this technically does use the “RuneScape Clock”. As do most RSPS, the game engine in Hyperion (Base of PD) calls for a tick every 600ms.
[/quote]
Calling a tick every 600ms isn’t anything. If it doesn’t execute like RuneScape does, then it’s completely irrelevant. To top it all off, using an “engine” from another base just shows the incompetence of the programmers.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Project Destiny 474 - Great Economy, Great Skilling! ~ Highscores! ~

item.title: Project Destiny 474 - Great Economy, Great Skilling! ~ Highscores! ~
item.dc:creator: @Shiver Shiver
item.description:
@Shiver wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:40, topic:451858”][quote author=shiverr link=topic=554749.msg4082606#msg4082606 date=1345497575]

The content that is added is flawless.

Meaning this server runs just like RuneScape? Using the RuneScape Clock?
I doubt it. There is no such thing as “flawless”, everyone has their own programming habits.

Actually…that post is quite ignorant…this technically does use the “RuneScape Clock”. As do most RSPS, the game engine in Hyperion (Base of PD) calls for a tick every 600ms.
[/quote]
Calling a tick every 600ms isn’t anything. If it doesn’t execute like RuneScape does, then it’s completely irrelevant. To top it all off, using an “engine” from another base just shows the incompetence of the programmers.[/quote]

You’re not getting my point. It does execute like RuneScape does. On a 600ms tick. It may not be written the same way, but it performs on that tick schedule.

Also, you’re an idiot if you think reinventing the wheel is what should be done every time someone writes a server. I am the programmer, and have been around the RSPS community probably longer then you have been playing RuneScape.

Therefore, you have no leverage to say that someone is “incompetent” for using an already-written server.

To the above post, what do you even mean? The “packets need to be rewritten”?
The server needed to be modified to support the #474 protocol. Think before you post.

PS
The BASE is Hyperion, therefore the engine was already there…

It’s funny how you think I’m some incompetent retard when I know more about the RuneScape protocol then you ever will…

Read full topic
